## Description {#details}

The classes here represent processor resource units and their management strategy.

These classes are managed by the Scheduler.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t SubResourceID = Strategies&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf/#a5d3c920b66ea797d6adb243862fdf47a">Index</a>&#93;-&gt;select(RS.getReadyMask());</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ResourceManager::use(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ResourceRef &amp;RR) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Mark the sub-resource referenced by RR as used.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RSID = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mca/#ae652ac0aafced9e7ef6249d3b4e50171">getResourceStateIndex</a>(RR.first);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">  ResourceState &amp;RS = &#42;Resources&#91;RSID&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">  RS.markSubResourceAsUsed(RR.second);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Remember to update the resource strategy for non-group resources with</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// multiple units.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RS.getNumUnits() &gt; 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal">    Strategies&#91;RSID&#93;-&gt;used(RR.second);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there are still available units in RR.first,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// then we are done.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RS.isReady())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">  AvailableProcResUnits ^= RR.first;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Notify groups that RR.first is no longer available.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/ivusers-cpp/#a4e5b9edb51eec9dbca592075eb64dfcb">Users</a> = Resource2Groups&#91;RSID&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/ivusers-cpp/#a4e5b9edb51eec9dbca592075eb64dfcb">Users</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Extract lowest set isolated bit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> GroupIndex = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mca/#ae652ac0aafced9e7ef6249d3b4e50171">getResourceStateIndex</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/ivusers-cpp/#a4e5b9edb51eec9dbca592075eb64dfcb">Users</a> &amp; (-<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/ivusers-cpp/#a4e5b9edb51eec9dbca592075eb64dfcb">Users</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">    ResourceState &amp;CurrentUser = &#42;Resources&#91;GroupIndex&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ResourceManager::issueInstructionImpl(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> InstrDesc &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4de98a9acffcef5bb4b31862cb8c72ac">Desc</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;ResourceWithCycles&gt;</a> &amp;Pipes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Step 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - Issue writes to non-group resources.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - Issue writes to groups with only a single resource unit available.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - Update reserved groups (if any)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// - Add any remaining resource usage requests to a Worklist.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">SmallVector&lt;std::pair&lt;uint64&#95;t, ResourceUsage&gt;</a>, 4&gt; Worklist;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Step 2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Prioritize writes to groups with less available resources.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// NOTE: this algorithm has quadratic complexity in the worst case scenario.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// On average, this algorithm is expected to perform quite well and always</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// converge in very few iterations. That is mainly because instructions rarely</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// consume more than two or three resource groups.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Worklist.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a74cdbd1e4f731e7d7cd83461b8b1de0b">sort</a>(Worklist, &#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ResourceWithUsage &amp;Lhs,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ResourceState &amp;RhsRS = &#42;Resources&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mca/#ae652ac0aafced9e7ef6249d3b4e50171">getResourceStateIndex</a>(Rhs.first)&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t LhsReadyUnits = LhsRS.getNumReadyUnits();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t RhsReadyUnits = RhsRS.getNumReadyUnits();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LhsReadyUnits == RhsReadyUnits)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Lhs.first &lt; Rhs.first;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LhsReadyUnits &lt; RhsReadyUnits;</Highlight></CodeLine>
